goals.3: Identify the BGP for workers in a films
goals.4: Compare the workers amongst the films directed by the two directors
goals.5: Return some numerical comparison between the two directors (e.g., how many workers in Tarantino's movies who also worked in Allen's films?, what is the film with the highest number of shared actors? Who is the most used actor by both the directors? etc. )
goals.6: Is the maximum budget for a Tarantino's movie higher of the max budget of an Allen's movie?
goals.7: Who has films with more nominations for Academy Awards and who won more Academy Awards (with his films not only personal awards).
goals.7.1: Find the BGP for Academy Awards
goals.7.3: Find how they are related to the directors
goals.7.4: Are there alternative queries to get the same result?

1.narrative: let's start with tarantino and retrieve all the properties associated
output: Les Archives du Spectacle Person ID
Museum of Modern Art artist ID
Vegetti Catalog of Fantastic Literature NILF ID
Union List of Artist Names ID
BFI Films, TV and people ID
National Library of Israel J9U ID
Treccani's Lessico del XXI Secolo ID

1.narrative: let's see the properties of Tarantino's Filmography

maybe we have to look for movies directed by tarantino, not movies that tarantino directed
basically, look for subjects for which tarantino is the object
tarantino directed Kill Bill, let's try and filter by name of the movie
1.query: select distinct ?movie ?name where{{ ?movie ?property wd:Q3772 . ?movie <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter regex(?name, '.*kill bill.*', 'i') }}

1.narrative: let's pick up the node relative to Kill Bill Volume 1 and let's figure out first of all its class

3.narrative:
trying to figure out all of the properties relative to all of the movies of wikidata would be useless
let's try and find the properties exiting kill bill first, hopefully we will be able to find
properties for director, workers in a film and so on
output: Box Office Mojo film ID (former scheme)
AFI Catalog of Feature Films ID
original language of film or TV show
BFI Films, TV and people ID

3.narrative:
there's a lot of properties, some we isolated through inspection, but there's a lot.
let's use tarantino as object to try and identify useful properties involving kill bill and tarantino
let's answer point 1. to get all movies directed by tarantino we could write
3.query: select distinct ?movie ?name ?date where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P577 ?date . }} order by asc(?date)
output: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair

3.narrative:
repetitions are probably publication dates in various continents/states, we just care about the movies for now
but it's nice to have them ordered by publication
let's do the same for Woody Allen
3.query: select distinct ?movie ?name ?date where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P577 ?date . }} order by asc(?date)
output: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex*
The Concert for New York City
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
A Rainy Day in New York
A Rainy Day in New York
A Rainy Day in New York
A Rainy Day in New York

3.narrative:
the property to answer point 2 was already found
to find the director of Kill Bill we would write

3.query: select distinct ?worker ?name where{{ wd:Q165325 wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58 ?worker . ?worker <http://schema.org/name> ?name }} order by asc(?name)

3.narrative: point 4 is very general, let's start by counting the total number of workers that have participated in a Tarantino movie
3.query: select (count(*) as ?n_distinct) where{{ {{ select distinct ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58 ?worker . }} }} }}
select (count(*) as ?n_distinct) where{{ {{ select distinct ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58 ?worker . }} }} }}

3.narrative:
looking at the list of roles we have identified, we may have missed some roles.
Is it possible that there are properties related to workers in roles such as
camera crew, costume designer, lighting, visual fx and so on?
let's expand the search of properties to the whole set of movies by Tarantino and Allen
the object of the property will be a person, most likely, so we use the class Human
3.query: select distinct ?property ?name where{{ ?movie ?property ?worker . ?property <http://schema.org/name> ?name . ?worker wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?movie wdt:P57 ?director . filter (?director in (wd:Q3772, wd:Q25089)) }}

select (count(*) as ?n_distinct) where{{ {{ select distinct ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker . }} }} }}

select (count(*) as ?n_distinct) where{{ {{ select distinct ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker . }} }} }}

4.narrative:
how many people worked in each tarantino movie?
first get distinct movie and worker, assumption is that some people may have more than 1 role
this counts the number of workers for each movie
4.query: select ?movie ?name (count(?worker) as ?n_workers) where{{ ?movie <http://schema.org/name> ?name . {{ select distinct ?movie ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?n_workers)
output: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

4.narrative:
how many different workers in each allen movie?
first get distinct movie and worker, assumption is that some people may have more than 1 role
this counts the number of workers for each movie
4.query: select ?movie ?name (count(?worker) as ?n_workers) where{{ ?movie <http://schema.org/name> ?name . {{ select distinct ?movie ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?n_workers)
output: The Concert for New York City
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex*
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
A Rainy Day in New York

4.narrative: which tarantino movies used a narrator?
4.query: select distinct ?movie ?name ?narratorName where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P2438 ?narrator . ?narrator <http://schema.org/name> ?narratorName . }}

4.narrative: which allen movies used a narrator?
4.query: select distinct ?movie ?name ?narratorName where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P2438 ?narrator . ?narrator <http://schema.org/name> ?narratorName . }}

4.narrative:
the top 10 people that took part in a tarantino movie, ordered by number of appearances
first get distinct movie and worker, assumption is that some people may have more than 1 role
4.query: select ?worker ?name (count(*) as ?appearances) where{{ ?worker <http://schema.org/name> ?name . {{ select distinct ?movie ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }} group by ?worker ?name order by desc(?appearances) limit 10

4.narrative:
of course, we should ignore the director, let's just extend the limit to 11
first get distinct movie and worker, assumption is that some people may have more than 1 role
4.query: select ?worker ?name (count(*) as ?appearances) where{{ ?worker <http://schema.org/name> ?name . {{ select distinct ?movie ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }} group by ?worker ?name order by desc(?appearances) limit 11

select ?worker ?name (count(*) as ?appearances) where{{ ?worker <http://schema.org/name> ?name . {{ select distinct ?movie ?worker where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P57|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }} group by ?worker ?name order by desc(?appearances) limit 11

4.narrative: In which movies did Tarantino both act and direct?
4.query: select distinct ?movie ?name where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P161 wd:Q3772 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }}

4.narrative: In which movies did Allen both act and direct?
4.query: select distinct ?movie ?name where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P161 wd:Q25089 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }}
output: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex*
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion

5.narrative: Point 5. how many workers in Tarantino movies also worked in Allen movies?
5.query: select (count(*) as ?n) where{{ {{ select distinct ?worker where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?movie1 wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?movie2 wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie1 wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker . ?movie2 wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker }} }} }}

select distinct ?worker ?name where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?movie1 wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?movie2 wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie1 wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker . ?movie2 wdt:P1040|wdt:P161|wdt:P162|wdt:P86|wdt:P58|wdt:P2515|wdt:P344|wdt:P2554|wdt:P1431|wdt:P2438|wdt:P175|wdt:P767 ?worker . ?worker <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }}

5.narrative:
Point 5. What is the film with the hightest number of shared actors?
first select distinct all actors that have worked in movies from both directors
5.query: select ?movie ?name (count(*) as ?n_shared) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 ?director ; wdt:P161 ?actor ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter(?director in (wd:Q25089, wd:Q3772)) }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?n_shared)
output: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
The Concert for New York City
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex*
The Curse of the Jade Scorpion
A Rainy Day in New York
Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair

5.narrative:
this result doesnt' convince me, let's scale down
first select distinct all actors that have worked in movies from both directors
5.query: select distinct ?actor ?name where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor . ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie2 wdt:P161 ?actor . ?actor <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }}

select ?film ?name (count(*) as ?n_shared) where{{ ?film wdt:P161 ?actor . ?film wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?film wdt:P57 ?director . ?film <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter(?director in (wd:Q3772, wd:Q25089)) . {{ select distinct ?actor where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor . ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie2 wdt:P161 ?actor . }} }} }} group by ?film ?name order by desc(?n_shared)
output: The Concert for New York City
Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair
Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex*

5.narrative: which shared actors appear in pulp fiction?
5.query: select ?actor ?name where{{ ?film wdt:P161 ?a . ?film wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . ?film wdt:P57 ?director . ?film <http://schema.org/name> ?filmName . filter(?director in (wd:Q3772, wd:Q25089)) . {{ select distinct ?actor where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor . ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie2 wdt:P161 ?actor . }} }} filter(?a = ?actor) . ?a <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter regex(?filmName, 'pulp fiction', 'i') . }} group by ?film ?name order by desc(?n_shared)

5.narrative: Point 5. actor most used by both directors
5.query: select ?actor1 ?name ?total where{{ {{ select ?actor1 (count(*) as ?n1) where{{ {{ select distinct ?movie1 ?actor1 where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor1 . }} }} }} group by ?actor1 }} {{ select ?actor2 (count(*) as ?n2) where{{ {{ select distinct ?movie2 ?actor2 where{{ ?movie2 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie2 wdt:P161 ?actor2 . }} }} }} group by ?actor2 }} ?actor1 <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter(?actor1 = ?actor2) . bind((?n1 + ?n2) as ?total) }} group by ?actor1 ?name order by desc(?total) limit 1

5.narrative:
that was a long query, let's make sure the result is correct. in how many Tarantino movies did uma thurman act?
get all actors that worked for Tarantino
count how many times each actor has been used by Tarantino
5.query: select ?actor1 ?name (count(*) as ?n1) where{{ {{ select distinct ?movie1 ?actor1 where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor1 . }} }} ?actor1 <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter regex(?name, 'uma thurman', 'i') }} group by ?actor1 ?name

5.narrative:
in how many Allen movies did uma thurman act?
get all actors that worked for Allen
count how many times each actor has been used by Allen
5.query: select ?actor1 ?name (count(*) as ?n1) where{{ {{ select distinct ?movie1 ?actor1 where{{ ?movie1 wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 . ?movie1 wdt:P161 ?actor1 . }} }} ?actor1 <http://schema.org/name> ?name . filter regex(?name, 'uma thurman', 'i') }} group by ?actor1 ?name

6.query: ask where{{ {{ select (max(?cost) as ?maxCost1) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2130 ?cost ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} {{ select (max(?cost) as ?maxCost2) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2130 ?cost ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} filter(?maxCost1 > ?maxCost2) }}

6.narrative: let's print the maximum budget for a Tarantino movie
6.query: select ?movie ?name ?cost where{{ ?movie wdt:P2130 ?cost ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?cost) limit 1

6.narrative: let's print the maximum budget for an Allen movie
6.query: select ?movie ?name ?cost where{{ ?movie wdt:P2130 ?cost ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?cost) limit 1
6.parseError: [('movie', 'http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q1321004'), ('name', 'You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger'), ('cost', '22000000')]

6.query: ask where{{ {{ select (max(?gain) as ?maxGain1) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} {{ select (max(?gain) as ?maxGain2) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} filter(?maxGain1 > ?maxGain2) }}

6.narrative:
let's see the greatest amount of profit for the 2 directors
let's print the maximum box office for a Tarantino movie
6.query: select ?movie ?name ?gain where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?gain) limit 1

6.narrative: let's print the maximum box office for an Allen movie
6.query: select ?movie ?name ?gain where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name . }} group by ?movie ?name order by desc(?gain) limit 1

ask where{{ {{ select (sum(?gain) as ?total1) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} {{ select (sum(?gain) as ?total2) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }} }} filter(?total1 > ?total2) }}

6.narrative: The total box office of Tarantino movies?
6.query: select (sum(?gain) as ?total) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }}

6.narrative: The total box office of Allen movies?
6.query: select (sum(?gain) as ?total) where{{ ?movie wdt:P2142 ?gain ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 . }}

7.1.query: select ?movie ?name where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P1411 wd:Q103360 . }}

7.narrative: how many academy award nominations did Tarantino movies get?
7.query: select (count(*) as ?nominations) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 }}

7.narrative: how many academy award nominations did Allen movies get?
7.query: select (count(*) as ?nominations) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 }}

ask where{{ {{ select (count(*) as ?nominations1) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 }} }} {{ select (count(*) as ?nominations2) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 }} }} filter(?nominations2 > ?nominations1) }}

7.narrative:
Point 7. Who has films with more nominations for Academy Awards and who won more Academy Awards?
let's see which tarantino movies won academy awards
7.query: select ?name ?awardName where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P166 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?awardName }}
output: Academy Award for Best Writing, Original Screenplay
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor
Academy Award for Best Writing, Original Screenplay
Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
Academy Award for Best Production Design

7.narrative: let's see which allen movies won academy awards
7.query: select ?name ?awardName where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424; <http://schema.org/name> ?name ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P166 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 ; <http://schema.org/name> ?awardName }}
output: Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
Academy Award for Best Writing, Original Screenplay
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor

7.query: ask where{{ {{ select (count(*) as ?allenAwardWinners) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P166 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 . }} }} {{ select (count(*) as ?tarantinoAwardWinners) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P166 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 . }} }} filter(?allenAwardWinners > ?tarantinoAwardWinners) }}

ask where{{ {{ select (count(*) as ?allenNominations) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q25089 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 . }} }} {{ select (count(*) as ?tarantinoNominations) where{{ ?movie wdt:P31 wd:Q11424 ; wdt:P57 wd:Q3772 ; wdt:P1411 ?award . ?award wdt:P31 wd:Q19020 . }} }} filter(?allenNominations > ?tarantinoNominations) }}
